content.rendered:
Open Funding Opportunities

Prishtina REA aims to facilitate our wide networking partners about the advertises availability of grant support through notices of funding opportunities, published by diverse programmes. Explore and analyse the open funding opportunity specific to your area of interest or apply to one of selected generic calls as per your profile and developments.

Make sure you:

  • Search for funding opportunities in the listed links of Funding Opportunities. Prishtina REA posts attractive funding opportunities related to various programmes.
  • Use the instructions in the funding opportunity in conjunction with the application guide to prepare your application. If instructions conflict, follow the funding opportunity.
  • Pay attention to notices posted in the Published Calls and Guide for Grants and Contracts. Guidance included in notices supersedes guidance in the funding opportunity and application guide, aligning to the call procedures, requirement and processes.
  • Prepare your senses of Concept IDEA, shape the proper consortia composition, update your Profile, using your PIC ID number, prior to submitting the applications in response to a specific funding opportunity.
  • There is not a generic application form package that can be downloaded and used for all grant application submissions. You must use the application form package associated with the funding opportunity to which you are applying. Access the opportunity-specific form package through your chosen submission method
  • Read the funding opportunity carefully. Applications that include official templates (Technical proposal and Budget Form) must be submitted in response to a funding opportunity that provides these templates
  • Return to the funding opportunity to check the Related Notices section before submission to ensure you are in line with the most recent guidance, criteria and requirements.
  • Pay particular attention to the review criteria and write your application keeping these review criteria in mind.

Contact Prishtina REA staff listed in the funding opportunity to discuss your application, if needed!
